description: Want to enjoy a cold beer, but can't find your bottle popper? Solve that emergency forever with this wall mounted bottle opener! opening your beer bottles in seconds! Designed with practicality and efficiency in mind - it's the best go-to accessory that every professional barman needs. Complete your kitchen, looks bold in a man cave or on your patio. Tired of losing and keeping track of your bottle opener? Stop carrying one at all! This ideal wall mounted bottle opener is the key to faster access to whatever your drink of choice. Easy and fast opening of standard-sized bottle caps. With its Western look, this cast iron opener will make a great addition to your garage, kitchen or man cave!
